hours_text:
## Our two locations

#### Foothills ARt Center – astor house, [1133 Arapahoe Street, Golden, CO](http://web.archive.org/web/20250916231054/https://maps.app.goo.gl/Ev3jp72gdFZRCR5g9)

The Foothills Art Center at Astor House proudly hosts our exhibitions! Come and visit for free! _**Free admission is generously sponsored by[The Colorado Gives Foundation](http://web.archive.org/web/20250916231054/https://coloradogivesfoundation.org/)**_

**Hours of Operation:**

  * Monday – Saturday: 10 am – 5 pm 
  * Sunday: 12 pm – 5 pm

Foothills Art Center (both Astor House and Creative Campus) are closed on:

  * New Years Eve Day
  * New Years Day
  * Presidents Day
  * Easter Day
  * Memorial Day
  * 4th of July
  * Labor Day
  * Thanksgiving Day
  * Christmas Eve
  * Christmas Day

Any delays or closures due to inclement weather will be posted on our homepage

[**Seasonal Hours**](http://web.archive.org/web/20250916231054/https://foothillsartcenter.org/astor-house-seasonal-hours/)

#### Foothills art center – Creative campus, 809 15th Street, Golden CO

Foothills Art Center Creative Campus is bustling with classes, Studio Artists, and educational programs.

**Our Creative Campus is currently only open exclusively for our classes and artists. **If you need assistance gaining entry, please reach out to your instructor directly.

[Browse classes & events](http://web.archive.org/web/20250916231054/https://foothillsartcenter.org/art-events/)

## 2025 exhibitions

[](http://web.archive.org/w...

collections_text:
## CURRENT AND UPCOMING EXHIBITS

Our exhibits are open to the public so everyone can find inspiration, gain a fresh perspective, and make new connections through art. Come and visit the Astor House today and see what’s on view.

[](http://web.archive.org/web/20251218023919/https://foothillsartcenter.org/exhibits/50th-holiday-art-market/)

### [50th holiday art market](http://web.archive.org/web/20251218023919/https://foothillsartcenter.org/exhibits/50th-holiday-art-market/)

November 22 – December 29

Features works from over 100 Colorado artists in this festive Foothills Art Center tradition.

[Read More](http://web.archive.org/web/20251218023919/https://foothillsartcenter.org/exhibits/50th-holiday-art-market/)

[](http://web.archive.org/web/20251218023919/https://foothillsartcenter.org/exhibits/2026-members-show/)

### [2026 Members’ Show](http://web.archive.org/web/20251218023919/https://foothillsartcenter.org/exhibits/2026-members-show/)

January 31 – May 3

Presenting over 70 pieces featuring our diverse artistic talents and techniques of artistic members

[Read More](http://web.archive.org/web/20251218023919/https://foothillsartcenter.org/exhibits/2026-members-show/)

[](http://web.archive.org/web/20251218023919/https://foothillsartcenter.org/exhibits/red-rocks-community-college-visual-audio-media-arts/)
